video.title: Learn to Code RPG - A freeCodeCamp.org Game [playthrough + gamedev interview]
video.description:
You didn't realize you needed this until now: A brand new game from freeCodeCamp. Learn all about Learn To Code RPG from game creator Lynn Zheng and watch a playthough from Ania Kubów.

Learn more about the game and its development here: https://www.freecodecamp.org/news/learn-to-code-rpg/
Download the game for free from Itch: https://freecodecamp.itch.io/learn-to-code-rpg
Check out the open source code on GitHub: https://github.com/freeCodeCamp/LearnToCodeRPG

topLevelComment.author: Lynn's DevLab
topLevelComment.text:
Hi everyone - Lynn here. I had great fun building this game using Ren'Py. If you are interested in building games like this, check out my channel where I'll be posting game dev tutorials: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZ2MeG5jTIqgzEMiByrIzsw.
Hope you enjoy playing the game as much as I enjoyed building it :D

topLevelComment.author: Todd Boothbee
topLevelComment.text: This game made me realize I shouldn't try to get a web dev job after 50.  Because I'm not sexual viable to those in power, I should instead pursue freelancing or some form of consultancy. Perhaps someday a later version of the game would include such a path.

topLevelComment.author: Ben Hasel
topLevelComment.text: Is this game full already???? I played until I reached my first programming job but can't continue anymore. Any updates?? Loved this game!

topLevelComment.author: Rebecca A
topLevelComment.text: This is so nice. It really addresses a lot of the worries and struggles that people encounter when starting out with programming. I enjoyed the playthrough a lot. Thank you for all the work you put into this!

topLevelComment.author: KaraDUN
topLevelComment.text: This game looks very helpful. I managed to unzip the file but I can't use it since my Chromebook doesn't support the game .sh file. I've been told that I need to change the execution access but can someone tell me how to do that?
